overview: Strategic Advisor. Entrepreneur. Angel Investor. Mentor. Raconteur. Focused on deploying pursuasive technologies and growing emerging companies. Co-Founder of Mojofiti, Mojolingual, LuxQ, DemoRing and Simon l Semenoff. Founder of Vurtu and 1Slash. Senior Editor at The Fancy.
